name: Santa's Present Dropoff
description:
Its time for Santa to give out his presents, however some children have been naughty and some have been nice, so make sure you deliver the presents to the good children (white smoke house) and coal to the naughty children (black smoke house). Make sure Santa misses no more than 10 houses or Christmas will be over.

WASD to Move
Space/LMB/Left-CTRL to drop present
MMB Up for Coal/2
MMB Down for Present/1
